events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of June 1st involving a rear-end collision at a traffic light.
The received claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' due to the involvement of the insured vehicle in a traffic collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the claim and will act as the primary point of contact for the policyholder.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the policyholder promptly, confirming receipt and outlining the next steps in the process.
The claims team requested supporting documents including the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a repair estimate.
The policyholder successfully submitted all required documents on time, including a detailed repair quote from an authorized service center.
The investigation into the accident circumstances and liability has commenced with preliminary review of submitted materials and statements.
The investigation concluded with the confirmation that the insured driver was not at fault and damages align with reported incident details.
A settlement offer was formulated and proposed to the policyholder covering the full cost of repairs along with a rental car reimbursement.
The policyholder provided positive feedback appreciating the prompt response and clarity of communication throughout the claim process.
Claim approval was finalized following acceptance of the settlement terms by the insured, authorizing the issuance of payment.
The payment covering vehicle repair costs and associated expenses was processed and transferred to the policyholderâ€™s account.
The claim case was officially closed after successful reimbursement and confirmation that all repair work was completed satisfactorily.
The claim records were archived in the company system for future reference and regulatory compliance purposes.
